municipality_name.instruction: Enter the name of the municipality

inter_municipality_name.instruction: Enter the name of the inter-municipality organization

logo.instruction: Provide the URL or path to the municipality logo. DO NOT HALUCINATE A URL, provide a real image url that you found on the internet!

population.instruction: Enter the total population of the municipality

area.instruction: Enter the total area of the municipality in square kilometers

data_from_year.instruction: Enter the year from which this data was collected

total_budget.instruction: Enter the total budget of the municipality in euros

total_budget_per_person.instruction: Enter the total budget per person in euros

debt_repayment_capacity.instruction: Enter the debt repayment capacity as a ratio

debt_ratio.instruction: Enter the debt ratio as a percentage

debt_duration.instruction: Enter the debt duration in years

year.instruction: Find 3 important historical milestones concerning the municipality. Order them consecutively. This is the first one. Enter the year of the first historical milestone

milestone.content: Formation of the Communauté Urbaine through merger of Le Havre agglomeration, Canton de Criquetot-l'Esneval, and Caux Estuaire communities
milestone.instruction: Find 3 important historical milestones concerning the municipality. Order them consecutively. This is the first one. Describe the first historical milestone event
milestone.example: Création de la Communauté d'Agglomération de Dijon Métropole

milestone.content: Establishment of the Communauté de l'agglomération havraise (CODAH)

milestone.content: Creation of the District of Le Havre, first intercommunal structure

historical_milestones.instruction: Find 3 important historical milestones concerning the inter-municipalities. Make sure they are 3 distinct and different events. Take care of this when researching the individual milestones.

theme.instruction: Find 3 important green projects concerning the municipality. This is the first one. Name the environmental theme of the project. Make sure to only state the theme and not include anything else. Don't ever explain yourself. It's very important that you just name the theme and don't return anything else.

Make sure to only state the category and not include anything else. Don't ever explain yourself. It's very important that you just name the category and don't return anything else.

description.content: Construction of a 100 MW green hydrogen production plant in Gonfreville-l'Orcher near Le Havre, set to produce 34 tonnes of green hydrogen daily by 2028, supported by a €149 million government grant. Source: https://www.lhyfe.com/press/lhyfe-receives-from-the-french-government-a-grant-of-up-to-149m-for-large-scale-production-of-green-and-renewable-hydrogen-near-le-havre-in-france/

Preferably this would include the date of the project and perhaps some other facts on how this project will help the community.
description.example: Deployment of photovoltaic panels on the roofs of public buildings (Anjou and Buffon school groups, Gymnasium, Fontaine d'Ouche stadium, etc.).

description.content: Construction of the Methavert e-methanol production facility at Rogerville in Le Havre port, capable of producing 200,000 tonnes of e-methanol annually to support maritime transport decarbonization, located on a 60-hectare site. Source: https://safety4sea.com/qair-develops-e-methanol-project-on-haropa-port/

Source: https://www.renewableenergymagazine.com/biomass/suez-and-vauban-infrastructure-partners-invest-in-20241126

green_projects.instruction: Find 3 important green projects concerning the municipality. Make sure they are 3 distinct, different and representative projects. Here are some websites that might help your search and provide some context: https://francevilledurable.fr/les-realisations/carte-des-realisations/, https://plainecommune.fr/projets/grands-projets-urbains/lecoquartier-fluvial/, https://www.ecologie.gouv.fr/, https://www.iledefrance-mobilites.fr/le-reseau/projets, https://www.ademe.fr/, https://www.banquedesterritoires.fr/notre-identite, https://www.onpv.fr/, https://francevilledurable.fr/, https://www.ademe.fr/en/futures-in-transition/, https://www.caissedesdepots.fr/blog/tag/PROJET%20URBAIN. Here are some examples and categories to keep in mind when you search for similar current projects: Under « Énergies renouvelables »: Installation d’unité de production d’énergie de sources renouvelables (Solaire, Eolien, Hydraulique, Géothermie, Biomasse); under « Gestion durable de l’eau et de l’assainissement »: Service public de l’eau potable, Service public de l’assainissement, Gestion des Eaux Pluviales, et GEMAPI; under « Gestion et valorisation des déchets »: Collecte et tri des Déchets Ménagers et Assimilés (DMA), puis Traitement des DMA par Réemploi, Recyclage ou compostage, et Valorisation énergétique; under « Mobilité douce et transports propres »: Transport individuel (véhicules électriques, dispositifs de recharge, pistes cyclables) et Transport en commun (Tramways, bus électriques…, Infrastructures ferroviaires, Pôles d’échanges multimodaux…); and under « Efficacité énergétique de la construction & de l’aménagement urbain »: Aménagement Urbain (modernisation de l’éclairage urbain) et Construction ou rénovation de bâtiments. You must specify the source when you provide the detailed description for the project in the following format, but make sure that it fits into the sentence with proper grammar and punctuation: "Source: <link to source>". Specify the link to the source at the very end of the detailed description and not before.

description.content: LIVE Campus (L'Institut des Vocations pour l'Emploi), inaugurated in 2024, is the sixth LIVE campus in France and first in western France, supporting adults over 25 who have been inactive. The program offers 18 weeks of free support to help individuals re-enter the workforce, contributing to an increased annual hosting capacity of over 650 people across France Source: https://www.lvmh.com/en/news-lvmh/live--linstitut-des-vocations-pour-lemploi--expands-its-hosting-capacity-with-the-inauguration-of-a-new-campus-in-le-havre
description.instruction: Find 3 important social projects concerning the municipality. This is the first one. Provide a detailed description of the social project including any statistics that you find. Preferably this would include the date of the project and perhaps some other facts on how this project will help the community.
description.example: Major multiyear renovation plan for Dijon's 76 schools: budget of 75M€ including: 30M€ over 10 years for renovation and modernization, 36.7M€ to remove prefal and 4.3M€ to renovate school grounds and surroundings, e.g. Anjou nursery school (beautificatio of school interiors; Beaumarchais elementary school: renovation of sanitar facilities; Dampierre elementary school: replacement of ground-floor woodwork; Flammarion gymnasium and ALSH schoo groups: partial interior renovation, installation of roller shutters and roof repairs; Coteaux du Suzon, Plein Air and Ouest elementary school groups: renovation of flat roofs; Darcy school group: renovation of préau...).

social_projects.instruction: Find 3 important social projects concerning the municipality. Make sure they are 3 distinct, different and representative projects. Here are some websites that might help your search and provide some context: https://francevilledurable.fr/les-realisations/carte-des-realisations/, https://plainecommune.fr/projets/grands-projets-urbains/lecoquartier-fluvial/, https://www.ecologie.gouv.fr/, https://www.iledefrance-mobilites.fr/le-reseau/projets, https://www.ademe.fr/, https://www.banquedesterritoires.fr/notre-identite, https://www.onpv.fr/, https://francevilledurable.fr/, https://www.ademe.fr/en/futures-in-transition/, https://www.caissedesdepots.fr/blog/tag/PROJET%20URBAIN. Here are some examples and categories to keep in mind when you search for similar current projects: Under « Service d’incendie et de secours »: Services Départementaux d’Incendie et de Secours (SDIS); under « Action sanitaire, sociale et familiale »: Etablissements sociaux et médico-sociaux (EHPAD, IME…), Etablissements de la Petite Enfance (crèches…), Maisons de santé; under « Enseignement et formation professionnelle »: Etablissements d’enseignement (écoles, collèges, lycées), Etablissements de formation professionnelle (CFA, IFSI…), Services annexes (restauration et ramassage scolaire…); under « Sport, culture et vie associative »: Equipements sportifs (gymnases, piscines…), Equipements culturels (musées, patrimoine…), Equipements de la vie associative locale (maisons des associations…), Espaces verts (parcs et jardins); and under « Développement et cohésion territoriale »: Renouvellement urbain des Quartiers Prioritaires de la Ville (QPV), Opération de Revitalisation de Territoire (ORT), Subvention d’investissement au logement social, et Déploiement du Très Haut Débit. You must specify the source when you provide the detailed description for the project in the following format, but make sure that it fits into the sentence with proper grammar and punctuation: "Source: <link to source>". Specify the link to the source at the very end of the detailed description and not before.

description.content: Le Havre Seine Métropole is developing a major offshore wind power project aiming to generate 5 GW of energy to power local industries and reduce fossil fuel dependency, combined with industrial waste heat recovery to supply renewable heat to nearby areas, which is part of their commitment to achieve significant carbon reduction by 2030 Source: https://www.ecadin.org/insights-from-ecadins-visit-to-le-havre/
description.instruction: Find 3 important green projects concerning the inter-municipality. This is the first one. Acquisition of household waste skips, upgrading of sorting center PPI of €21 M

social_projects.instruction: Find 3 important social projects concerning the inter-municipality. Make sure they are 3 distinct, different and representative projects. Here are some websites that might help your search and provide some context: https://francevilledurable.fr/les-realisations/carte-des-realisations/, https://plainecommune.fr/projets/grands-projets-urbains/lecoquartier-fluvial/, https://www.ecologie.gouv.fr/, https://www.iledefrance-mobilites.fr/le-reseau/projets, https://www.ademe.fr/, https://www.banquedesterritoires.fr/notre-identite, https://www.onpv.fr/, https://francevilledurable.fr/, https://www.ademe.fr/en/futures-in-transition/, https://www.caissedesdepots.fr/blog/tag/PROJET%20URBAIN. Here are some examples and categories to keep in mind when you search for similar current projects: Under « Service d’incendie et de secours »: Services Départementaux d’Incendie et de Secours (SDIS); under « Action sanitaire, sociale et familiale »: Etablissements sociaux et médico-sociaux (EHPAD, IME…), Etablissements de la Petite Enfance (crèches…), Maisons de santé; under « Enseignement et formation professionnelle »: Etablissements d’enseignement (écoles, collèges, lycées), Etablissements de formation professionnelle (CFA, IFSI…), Services annexes (restauration et ramassage scolaire…); under « Sport, culture et vie associative »: Equipements sportifs (gymnases, piscines…), Equipements culturels (musées, patrimoine…), Equipements de la vie associative locale (maisons des associations…), Espaces verts (parcs et jardins); and under « Développement et cohésion territoriale »: Renouvellement urbain des Quartiers Prioritaires de la Ville (QPV), Opération de Revitalisation de Territoire (ORT), Subvention d’investissement au logement social, et Déploiement du Très Haut Débit. You must specify the source when you provide the detailed description for the project in the following format, but make sure that it fits into the sentence with proper grammar and punctuation: "Source: <link to source>". Specify the link to the source at the very end of the detailed description and not before.

name.instruction: This is for the first contact ONLY, enter only information concerning this contact. Enter the full name of the first contact person. Answer with just the name, without any explanation or excuse.

title.instruction: This is for the first contact ONLY, enter only information concerning this contact. Enter the professional title of the first contact person. Answer with max 5 words, without any explanation or excuse.

title_since.instruction: This is for the first contact ONLY, enter only information concerning this contact. Enter the date when the first person started in this title. Answer with just the date, without any explanation or excuse.

birth_date.instruction: This is for the first contact ONLY, enter only information concerning this contact. Enter the birth date of the first contact person. Answer with just the date, without any explanation or excuse.

birth_place.instruction: This is for the first contact ONLY, enter only information concerning this contact. Enter the birth place of the first contact person. Answer with just the place, without any explanation or excuse.

education.content: Sciences Po Paris (1992), École nationale d'administration (1997)
education.instruction: This is for the first contact ONLY, enter only information concerning this contact. List the educational background of the first contact person. Be as brief, conscise and specific as possible.
education.example: Master's degree in public law and sports management from the University of Burgundy (1999), Bachelor's degree in public administration, Université Paris I Panthéon-Assas (2005), Institute for Public Management and Economic Development (IGPDE) (2006)

activities.content: Mayor of Le Havre (since 2020), President of Le Havre Seine Métropole, President of International Association of Cities and Ports (since 2021)
activities.instruction: This is for the first contact ONLY, enter only information concerning this contact. List the professional activities of the first contact person. Be as brief, conscise and specific as possible.
activities.example: 1st Vice-President of Dijon Métropole in charge of soft mobility, the bicycle plan, the European Green Capital, relations with the Département (since September 2024)

career.content: Deputy Mayor of Le Havre (2001-2010), Director General UMP party (2002-2004), Mayor of Le Havre (2010-2017), Member of National Assembly (2012-2017), Prime Minister of France (2017-2020), Mayor of Le Havre (since 2020)
career.instruction: This is for the first contact ONLY, enter only information concerning this contact. List the career history of the first contact person. Be as brief, conscise and specific as possible.
career.example: Former French champion in 5,000 m canoe-kayak (1998), Deputy mayor of Dijon, responsible for trade, crafts and the Cour de ville project, then local democracy (2008-2014), Lecturer in Master 2 at the Faculty of Sports, University of Burgundy (2010-2014), 1st Deputy Mayor of Dijon, responsible for ecological transition, climate and the environment (2014-2024), Acting Mayor of Dijon (July 27-August 10, 2015)

name.instruction: This is for the second contact ONLY, enter only information concerning this contact. Enter the full name of the second contact person. Answer with just the name, without any explanation or excuse.

title.content: First Deputy Mayor of Le Havre
title.instruction: This is for the second contact ONLY, enter only information concerning this contact. Enter the professional title of the second contact person. Answer with max 5 words, without any explanation or excuse.
title.example: Chairman of the Dijon Metropolitan Council

title_since.instruction: This is for the second contact ONLY, enter only information concerning this contact. Enter the date when the second person started in this title. Answer with just the date, without any explanation or excuse.

birth_date.instruction: This is for the second contact ONLY, enter only information concerning this contact. Enter the birth date of the second contact person. Answer with just the date, without any explanation or excuse.

birth_place.instruction: This is for the second contact ONLY, enter only information concerning this contact. Enter the birth place of the second contact person. Answer with just the Place, without any explanation or excuse.

education.instruction: This is for the second contact ONLY, enter only information concerning this contact. List the educational background of the second contact person. Be as brief, conscise and specific as possible.
education.example: Master's degree in public law, DESS in Economics, DEA in Political Science

activities.content: First Deputy Mayor in charge of urban planning and environmental policy (since 2020)
activities.instruction: This is for the second contact ONLY, enter only information concerning this contact. List the professional activities of the second contact person. Be as brief, conscise and specific as possible.
activities.example: Chairman, CNER (Fédération des agences d'attractivité, de développement et d'innovation) (since May 2023)

career.content: Teacher at Le Havre colleges (1993-2010), Regional councilor (2010), Deputy Mayor (2011-2019), Mayor of Le Havre (2019-2020), First Deputy Mayor (since 2020)
career.instruction: This is for the second contact ONLY, enter only information concerning this contact. List the career history of the second contact person. Be as brief, conscise and specific as possible.
career.example: Burgundy regional councillor (1994-2001), PS National Secretary, in charge of organization and coordination (1997-2005), General Councillor for Côte-d'Or, Dijon 5 canton (1998-2008), Mayor of Dijon (2001-2024)

contacts.instruction: Find two contacts (e.g. the mayor of the municipality and the chairman of the inter-municipality) for the municipalities and their details. Give the answer as short as possible, idealy only a few words. Try to search for the individual contact persons after identifying them and then parse the specific informations from the search result.

total_budget.instruction: Enter the total budget amount in euros for the current year for this municipality

year.instruction: Enter the fiscal year of the budget data for the current year for this inter-municipality

total_budget.instruction: Enter the total budget amount in euros for the current year for this inter-municipality

inter_municipality.instruction: Enter the name of the inter-municipality being compared

debt_duration.instruction: Enter the debt duration of the compared municipality in years
